472:1: atha khalu bhagavān sarvāvantaṃ bodhisattvagaṇamāmantrayate sma-avakalpayadhvaṃ me kulaputrāḥ,
472:3: dvitīyakamapi bhagavāṃstān bodhisattvānāmantrayate sma-avakalpayadhvaṃ me kulaputrāḥ,
472:5: tṛtīyakamapi bhagavāṃstan bodhisattvānāmantrayate sma-avakalpayadhvaṃ me kulaputrāḥ,
472:7: atha khalu sa sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇo maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamagrataḥ sthāpayitvā añjaliṃ pragṛhya bhagavantametadavocat-bhāṣatu bhagavānetamevārtham,
472:10: dvitīyakamapi sa sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇo bhagavantametadavocat-bhāṣatu bhagavānetamevārtham,
472:13: tṛtīyakamapi sa sarvāṃvān bodhisattvagaṇo bhagavantametadavocat-bhāṣatu bhagavānetamevārtham,
472:16: atha khalu bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ yāvattṛtīyakamapyadhyeṣaṇāṃ viditvā tān bodhisattvānāmantrayate sma-tena hi kulaputrāḥ śṛṇudhvamidamevaṃrūpaṃ mamādhiṣṭhānabalādhānam,
472:17: yadayaṃ kulaputrāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuro loka evaṃ saṃjānīte-sāṃprataṃ bhagavatā śākyamuninā tathāgatena śākyakulādabhiniṣkramya gayāhvaye mahānagare bodhimaṇḍavarāgragatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddheti|
472:19: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ bahūni mama kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya|
472:20: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye pṛthivīdhātuparamāṇavaḥ,
472:22: sa ekaṃ paramāṇurajaṃ gṛhītvā pūrvasyāṃ diśi pañcāśallokadhātvasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇyatikramya tadekaṃ paramāṇurajaḥ samupanikṣipet|
472:23: anena paryāyeṇa kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi sa puruṣaḥ sarvāṃstāllokadhātūna vyapagatapṛthivīdhātūn kuryāt,
472:24: sarvāṇi ca tāni pṛthivīdhātuparamāṇurajāṃsi anena paryāyeṇa anena ca lakṣanikṣepeṇa pūrvasyāṃ diśyupanikṣipet|
472:25: tatkiṃ manyadhve kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ te lokadhātavaḥ kenaciccintayituṃ vā gaṇayituṃ vā tulayituṃ vā upalakṣayituṃ vā?
472:26: evamukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sa ca sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇo bodhisattvarāśirbhagavantametadavocat-asaṃkhyeyāste bhagavallokadhātavaḥ,
472:28: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhairapi bhagavan āryeṇa jñānena na śakyaṃ cintayituṃ vā gaṇayituṃ vā tulayituṃ vā upalakṣayituṃ vā|
472:29: asmākamapi tāvad bhagavan avaivartyabhūmisthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmasmin sthāne cittagocaro na pravartate|
472:31: evamukte bhagavāṃstān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānetadavocat-ārocayāmi vaḥ kulaputrāḥ,
472:33: yāvantaḥ kulaputrāste lokadhātavo yeṣu tena puruṣeṇa tāni paramāṇurajāṃsyupanikṣiptāni,
472:35: sarveṣu teṣu kulaputra lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu na tāvanti paramāṇurajāṃsi saṃvidyante,
472:37: yataḥprabhṛtyahaṃ kulaputrā asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi,
472:39: ye ca mayā kulaputrā atrāntarā tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ parikīrtitā dīpaṃkaratathāgataprabhṛtayaḥ,
472:43: tathāgata āgatāgatānāṃ sattvānāmindriyavīryavaimātratāṃ vyavalokya tasmiṃstasminnātmano nāma vyāharati|
472:45: tathā tathā ca sattvān paritoṣayati nānāvidhairdharmaparyāyaiḥ|
472:46: tatra kulaputrāstathāgato nānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāmalpakuśalamūlānāṃ bahūpakleśānāmevaṃ vadati-daharo'hamasmi bhikṣavo jātyābhiniṣkrāntaḥ|
472:52: sarve ca te kulaputrā dharmaparyāyāstathāgatena sattvānāṃ vinayārthāya bhāṣitāḥ|
472:53: yāṃ ca kulaputrāstathāgataḥ sattvānāṃ vinayārthavācaṃ bhāṣate ātmopadarśanena vā paropadarśanena vā,
472:54: ātmārambaṇena vā parārambanena vā yatkiṃcittathāgato vyāharati,
472:59: na jāyate na mriyate na cyavate nopapadyate na saṃsarati na parinirvāti,
472:60: na bhūtaṃ nābhūtaṃ na santaṃ nāsantaṃ na tathā nānyathā na vitathā nāvitathā|
472:61: na tathā traidhātukaṃ tathāgatena dṛṣṭaṃ yathā bālapṛthagjanāḥ paśyanti|
472:65: api tu khalu punaḥ sattvānāṃ nānācaritānāṃ nānābhiprāyāṇāṃ saṃjñāvikalpacaritānāṃ kuśalamūlasaṃjananārthaṃ vividhān dharmaparyāyān vividhairārambaṇairvyāharati|
472:69: na ca tāvanme kulaputrā adyāpi paurvikī bodhisattvacaryāṃ pariniṣpāditā|
472:71: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputrā adyāpi taddviguṇena me kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi bhaviṣyanti āyuṣpramāṇasyāparipūrṇatvāt|
472:72: idānīṃ khalu punarahaṃ kulaputrā aparinirvāyamāṇa eva parinirvāṇamārocayāmi|
472:74: sattvānahaṃ kulaputrā anena paryāyeṇa paripācayāmi-mā haiva me'ticiraṃ tiṣṭhato'bhīkṣṇadarśanena akṛtakuśalamūlāḥ sattvāḥ puṇyavirahitā daridrabhūtāḥ kāmalolupā andhā dṛṣṭijālasaṃchannāḥ tiṣṭhati tathāgata iti viditvā kilīkṛtasaṃjñā bhaveyuḥ,
472:75: na ca tathāgate durlabhasaṃjñāmutpādayeyuḥ-āsannā vayaṃ tathāgatasyeti|
472:78: tataḥ kulaputrāḥ tathāgataḥ upāyakauśalyena teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ durlabhaprādurbhāvo bhikṣavastathāgata iti vācaṃ vyāharati sma|
472:80: tathā hi teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ bahubhiḥ kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairapi tathāgatadarśanaṃ bhavati vā na vā|
472:81: tataḥ khalvahaṃ kulaputrāstadārambaṇaṃ kṛtvaivaṃ vadāmi-durlabhaprādurbhāvā hi bhikṣavastathāgatā iti|
472:82: te bhūyasyā mātrayā durlabhaprādurbhāvāṃstathāgatān viditvā āścaryasaṃjñāmutpādayiṣyanti,
472:84: apaśyantaśca tathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān tṛṣitā bhaviṣyanti tathāgatadarśanāya|
472:85: teṣāṃ tāni tathāgatārambaṇamanaskārakuśalamūlāni dīrgharātramarthāya hitāya sukhāya ca bhaviṣyanti|
472:86: etamarthaṃ viditvā tathāgato'parinirvāyanneva parinirvāṇamārocayati sattvānāṃ vaineyavaśamupādāya|
472:89: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ kaścideva vaidyapuruṣo bhavet paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī sukuśalaḥ sarvavyādhipraśamanāya|
472:90: tasya ca puruṣasya bahavaḥ putrā bhaveyurdaśa vā viṃśatirvā triṃśadvā catvāriṃśadvā pañcāśadvā śataṃ vā|
472:92: te cāsya sarve putrā garapīḍā vā viṣapīḍā vā bhaveyuḥ|
472:93: tena gareṇa vā viṣeṇa vā duḥkhābhirvedanābhirabhitūrṇā bhaveyuḥ|
472:94: te tena gareṇa vā viṣeṇa vā dahyamānāḥ pṛthivyāṃ prapateyuḥ|
472:95: atha sa teṣāṃ vaidyaḥ pitā pravāsādāgacchet|
472:96: te cāsya putrāstena gareṇa vā viṣeṇa vā duḥkhābhirvedanābhirārtāḥ|
472:99: sarve ca te tenaiva duḥkhenārtāstaṃ pitaraṃ dṛṣṭvābhinandeyuḥ,
472:103: atha khalu sa vaidyastān putrān duḥkhārtān dṛṣṭvā vedanābhibhūtān dahyataḥ pṛthivyāṃ pariveṣṭamānān,
472:104: tato mahābhaiṣajyaṃ samudānayitvā varṇasaṃpannaṃ gandhasaṃpannaṃ rasasaṃpannaṃ ca,
472:105: śilāyāṃ piṣṭvā teṣāṃ putrāṇāṃ pānāya dadyāt,
472:106: evaṃ cainān vadet-pibatha putrā idaṃ mahābhaiṣajyaṃ varṇasaṃpannaṃ gandhasaṃpannaṃ rasasaṃpannam|
472:107: idaṃ yūyaṃ putrā mahābhaiṣajyaṃ pītvā kṣipramevāsmād garādvā viṣādvā parimokṣyadhve,
472:109: tatra ye tasya vaidyasya putrā aviparītasaṃjñinaḥ te bhaiṣajyasya varṇaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā gandhaṃ cāghrāya rasaṃ cāsvādya kṣipramevābhyavahareyuḥ|
472:110: te cābhyavaharantastasmādābādhāt sarveṇa sarvaṃ vimuktā bhaveyuḥ|
472:111: ye punastasya putrā viparītasaṃjñinaḥ te taṃ pitaramabhinandeyuḥ,
472:112: enaṃ caivaṃ vadeyuḥ-diṣṭayāsi tāta kṣemasvastibhyāmāgato yastvamasmākaṃ cikitsaka iti|
472:116: tathā hi teṣāṃ tayā viparītasaṃjñyā tad bhaiṣajyamupanāmitaṃ varṇenāpi na rocate,
472:118: atha khalu sa vaidyapuruṣa evaṃ cintayet-ime mama putrā anena gareṇa vā viṣeṇa vā viparītasaṃjñinaḥ|
472:122: atha khalu sa vaidyastān putrānupāyakauśalyena tadbhaiṣajyaṃ pāyayitukāma evaṃ vadet-jīrṇo'hamasmi kulaputrāḥ,
472:130: sa evaṃ tān putrānupāyakauśalyena anuśiṣya anyataraṃ janapadapradeśaṃ prakrāntaḥ|
472:131: tatra gatvā kālagatamātmānaṃ yeṣāṃ glānānāṃ putrāṇāmārocayet,
472:133: atīva parideveyuḥ-yo hyasmākaṃ pitā nātho janako'nukampakaḥ so'pi nāmaikaḥ kālagataḥ,
472:135: te khalvanāthabhūtamātmānaṃ samanupaśyanto'śaraṇamātmānaṃ samanupaśyanto'bhīkṣṇaṃ śokārtā bhaveyuḥ|
472:136: teṣāṃ ca tayābhīkṣṇaṃ śokārtatayā sā viparītasaṃjñā aviparītasaṃjñā bhavet|
472:137: yacca tad bhaiṣajyaṃ varṇagandharasopetaṃ tadvarṇagandharasopetameva saṃjānīyuḥ|
472:140: atha khalu sa vaidyastān putrānābādhavimuktān viditvā punarevātmānamupadarśayet|
472:141: tatkiṃ manyadhve kulaputrā mā haiva tasya vaidyasya tadupāyakauśalyaṃ kurvataḥ kaścinmṛṣāvādena saṃcodayet?
472:145: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ ahamantarāntaramevaṃrūpāṇyupāyakauśalyāni sattvānāmupadarśayāmi vinayārtham|
472:146: na ca me kaścidatra sthāne mṛṣāvādo bhavati||
472:147: atha khalu bhagavānimāmeva arthagatiṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthā abhāṣata—
472:172: evaṃ ca haṃ teṣa vadāmi paścāt
472:178: yūyaṃ ca śabdaṃ na śṛṇotha mahyaṃ
472:200: evaṃ ca me kṣetramidaṃ sadā sthitaṃ
472:204: na cāpi me nāma śṛṇonti jātu
472:223: mṛṣā mamā naiva kadāci vāg bhavet||19||
472:227: taṃ vaidyu vijño na mṛṣeṇa codayet||20||
